faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our programs and services

questions.question: How do I register for a course?
questions.answer: You can register for a course by creating an account on our website, browsing the available courses, and following the enrollment process. You can also visit our center in person to register.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and cash payments at our center. We also offer installment payment plans for certain courses.

questions.question: Are your certifications recognized internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, our certifications are recognized by various international organizations and companies. Our partnerships with global tech companies ensure that our training meets industry standards.

questions.question: Do you offer online courses?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer both in-person and online courses. Our online platform provides interactive learning experiences with live instructor support and practical exercises.

questions.question: Can I cancel my registration?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your registration up to 7 days before the course starts for a full refund. Cancellations made less than 7 days before the start date may be subject to a cancellation fee.
